Modulation.Description: Different modulation type with different data rate, the matching map is DSSS-1:1.0Mbps,DSSS-2:2.0Mbps,CCK-5.5:5.5Mbps,CCK-11:11.0Mbps

RXLVL.Description: Rx level for per measurement. Unit:dBm

PacketCount.Description: Total packets count for RX configuration!

RefLVL.Description: Reference level for tx measure. Unit:dBm

ChanCoding.Description: Channel coding type selected: BCC, LDPC

Specification.Description: Configure the test tolerance and specification

TCFT.Description: Transmit Center Frequency Tolerance, Unit: PPM
